page.title: 13CARRICK GAZETTE NEWSPAPER
page.content: {CARRICK GAZETTE NEWS ITEMS FRIDAY {21.06.85.SUNDAY SCHOOL PRIZES}-It was the end of another term and the Sunday School pupils received their prizes during Sunday's service at Barr Parish Church.Several pupils performed an extract from Dorothy Sayers radio play,"The man born to be King". {OUTING}-Barr senior citizens enjoyed an outing to Belleisle Park,Ayr last Wednesday night.After an enjoyable walk round the gardens and aviary, high tea was served in Belleisle House Hotel. {FAREWELL BARR}-Barr Primary School pupils learned only last week that their headmaster is leaving for another school. Mr Tom Burnett will leave at the end of the term to take up a new post at Holmston School in Ayr.
